content:
As I mentioned earlier, now our company has to correct our marketing with a disclaimer stating that the course has a course attached. You should know, that I’ve taken the steps to correct 20 points accross the internet that the marketing may have been unclear. 8 mentions on YouTube. 7 mentions on the currently available shopify products, and 5 on our website and blog. We’ve replaced all existing hyperlinks with new ones for people to subscribe to our YouTube channel. Moving forward we’ll be more cognizant and take actions to prevent this from happening again.

With this knowledge, can you please, write a response to this section of a letter: "Per NAB procedures, Harmony Healthcare International, Inc. has thirty (30) days to correct the above issue and must contact NAB, in writing, to provide information on what has been done to remediate this concern. If not resolved, further action will be taken, which could include suspension and/or revocation or your NAB sponsor status.”
